content.query:
/*
There are several options to bring in data into Synapse. These are:
1. Using Synapse pipelines to import data
2. Using Azure Data Factory to import data
3. Using SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) to import data
4. Using a COPY statement to import data
*/

-- Create DimEmployee Table
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimEmployee]
(
    [EmployeeKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ParentEmployeeKey] [int] NULL,
    [EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
    [SalesTerritoryKey] [int] NULL,
    [FirstName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [LastName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
    [MiddleName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [NameStyle] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [Title] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [HireDate] [date] NULL,
    [BirthDate] [date] NULL,
    [LoginID] [nvarchar](256) NULL,
    [EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [Phone] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [MaritalStatus] [nchar](1) NULL,
    [EmergencyContactName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [EmergencyContactPhone] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
    [SalariedFlag] [bit] NULL,
    [Gender] [nchar](1) NULL,
    [PayFrequency] [tinyint] NULL,
    [BaseRate] [money] NULL,
    [VacationHours] [smallint] NULL,
    [SickLeaveHours] [smallint] NULL,
    [CurrentFlag] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [SalesPersonFlag] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [DepartmentName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [StartDate] [date] NULL,
    [EndDate] [date] NULL,
    [Status] [nvarchar](50) NULL
)
GO

-- Create UserData Table
CREATE TABLE UserData (
  registration_dttm datetime,
  id int,
  first_name varchar(200),
  last_name varchar(200),
  email varchar(200),
  gender varchar(20),
  ip_address varchar(200),
  cc varchar(200),
  country varchar(200),
  birthdate varchar(200),
  salary decimal,
  title varchar(200),
  comments varchar(1000)
)
GO

-- Using Synapse Pipelines to import Data
CREATE TABLE dbo.authenticom_sales (
  File_Type VARCHAR(20)
, DV_Dealer_ID NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
, Vendor_Dealer_ID NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, DMS_Type VARCHAR(50) NULL
, Deal_Number INT NULL
, Customer_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Full_Name NVARCHAR(200) NULL
, Salutation VARCHAR(20) NULL
, First_Name NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Middle_Name NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Last_Name NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Suffix NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Address_Line_1 NVARCHAR(500) NULL
, Address_Line_2 NVARCHAR(500) NULL
, City NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, State NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, Zip NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, County NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Home_Phone NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Cell_Phone NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Work_Phone NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Work_Extension INT NULL
, Email_1 NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Email_2 NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Email_3 NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Birth_Date DATETIME NULL
, Individual_Business_Flag NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, Opt_Out NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Block_Email NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Block_Phone NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Block_Mail NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Language NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Customer_Create_Date DATETIME NULL
, Customer_Last_Activity_Date DATETIME NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Customer_Number] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Full_Name] NVARCHAR(200) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Salutation] NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_First_Name] NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Middle_Name] NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Last_Name] NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Suffix] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Address_Line_1] NVARCHAR(500) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Address_Line_2] NVARCHAR(500) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_City] NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_State] NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Zip] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_County] NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Home_Phone] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Cell_Phone] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Work_Phone] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Work_Extension] NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Email_1]  NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Email_2]  NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Email_3]  NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Birth_Date] DATETIME NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Individual_Business_Flag] NVARCHAR(20) NULL
, [Co-Buyer_Opt_Out] NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, VIN NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Year INT NULL
, Make NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Model NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Model_Number NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Mileage INT NULL
, Description NVARCHAR(1024) NULL
, Exterior_Color NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, New_Used NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Stock_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Transmission NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Engine_Configuration NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Trim NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Engine_Number NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Chassis_Number NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, License_Plate_Number NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Delivery_Date DATETIME NULL
, Delivery_Mileage INT NULL
, Inventory_Date DATETIME NULL
, In_Service_Date DATETIME NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Year INT NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Make NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Model NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Trim NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Transmission_Type NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Fuel_Type NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_Engine_Size NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, VIN_Explosion_GVW_Range NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_1_VIN NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_1_Year INT NULL
, Trade_1_Make NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_1_Model NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_1_Odometer INT NULL
, Trade_1_Actual_Cash_Value FLOAT NULL
, Trade_1_Gross FLOAT NULL
, Trade_1_Payoff FLOAT NULL
, Trade_2_VIN NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_2_Year INT NULL
, Trade_2_Make NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_2_Model NVARCHAR(150) NULL
, Trade_2_Odometer INT NULL
, Trade_2_Actual_Cash_Value FLOAT NULL
, Trade_2_Gross FLOAT NULL
, Trade_2_Payoff FLOAT NULL
, Salesman_1_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Salesman_1_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Salesman_2_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Salesman_2_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Salesman_3_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Salesman_3_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Closing_Manager_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Closing_Manager_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Finance_Manager_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Finance_Manager_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Salesman_Manager_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Salesman_Manager_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, MSRP FLOAT NULL
, List_Price FLOAT NULL
, Sales_Price FLOAT NULL
, Journal_Price FLOAT NULL
, Cost FLOAT NULL
, Journal_Cost FLOAT NULL
, Adjustments FLOAT NULL
, Adjusted_Cost FLOAT NULL
, Incentives FLOAT NULL

, Sale_Net FLOAT NULL
, Total_Trade_Actual_Cash_Value FLOAT NULL
, Total_Trade_Gross FLOAT NULL
, We_Owe_Front FLOAT NULL
, Total_Front_Fees_Aftermarket_Profit FLOAT NULL
, Total_Front_Commission FLOAT NULL
, Total_Front_Sales FLOAT NULL
, Total_Front_Cost FLOAT NULL
, Front_Gross FLOAT NULL
, Finance_Profit FLOAT NULL

, Finance_Reserve FLOAT NULL

, Total_Back_Cost FLOAT NULL
, Back_Gross FLOAT NULL

, Gross_Payable FLOAT NULL

, Accounting_Date DATETIME NULL

--test data copied into authenticom_sales table
select CreatedDate, count(*) from dbo.authenticom_sales
group by CreatedDate
order by CreatedDate;

-- Using Azure Data Factory to import data
CREATE TABLE dbo.authenticom_service (
  identifier NVARCHAR(100)
, Payment_Method NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
, Operation_Codes NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Tech_Number NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Tech_Name NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Upsell NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Recommended_Operation_Codes NVARCHAR(200) NULL
, Recommendations NVARCHAR(1024) NULL
, Operation_Line_Number NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Operation_Sale_Types NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Operation_Line_Cost NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Operation_Line_Sale NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Misc_Cost NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Misc_Sale NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Gas_Oil_Grease_Cost NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Gas_Oil_Grease_Sale NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Sublet_Cost NVARCHAR(50) NULL
, Sublet_Sale NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Tech_Labor_Line NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Cause NVARCHAR(1024) NULL
, Labor_Complaint NVARCHAR(1024) NULL
, Labor_Correction NVARCHAR(1024) NULL
, Labor_Cost NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Sale NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Tech_Hours NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Bill_Hours NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Tech_Rate NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Labor_Bill_Rate NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Labor_Line_Number NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Cost NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Sale NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Line_Number NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Sale_Type NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Part_Number NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Part_Description NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, Part_Quantity NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Unit_Cost NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, Parts_Unit_Sale NVARCHAR(100) NULL
, VIN_MASK NVARCHAR(250) NULL
, CreatedDate DATETIME NULL
, RunSeqNo INT NOT NULL
, ingestion_dt DATETIME NOT NULL);

-- validate data copy using azure data factory
select CreatedDate, count(*) from dbo.authenticom_service
group by CreatedDate
order by CreatedDate;
